Stephen.text: Apple announces a Mac with a touch screen
Stephen.full-pick-text: Apple announces a Mac with a touch screen. It is an update to an existing notebook. macOS does not radically change to accommodate touch. The product comes with the Apple Polishing Cloth in the box.
Stephen.notes:
• "It is an update to an existing notebook." (in other words, not a new line like "MacBook Touch")
  • "macOS does not radically change to accommodate touch." (Specifically, the macOS on this machine does not have a custom UI compared to a non-touch Mac.)
  • "The product comes with the Apple Polishing Cloth in the box."

Stephen.text: Tim Cook's job title changes in 2026
Stephen.full-pick-text: Tim Cook's job title changes in 2026

Stephen.text: Apple announces an updated Mac Pro
Stephen.full-pick-text: Apple announces an updated Mac Pro. The starting price remains at $6,999. The starting system on a chip is the Apple M3 Ultra chip with 32-core CPU, 80-core GPU, and 32-core Neural Engine. There is a build-to-order option that exceeds the unified memory available on the Mac Studio, which currently tops out at 512 GB.
Stephen.notes:
• "The starting price remains at $6,999."
  • "The starting system on a chip is the Apple M3 Ultra chip with 32-core CPU, 80-core GPU, and 32-core Neural Engine."
  • "There is a build-to-order option that exceeds the unified memory available on the Mac Studio, which currently tops out at 512 GB."
  • Like a previous pick, this pick was prophesied in a dream, and one detail of the dream (the size of the Mac Pro wheels) was already confirmed, so it's basically a lock.

Stephen.text: iPadOS gets updated window management tools
Stephen.full-pick-text: iPadOS gets updated window management tools

Stephen.text: The Google Gemini logo is shown on screen as part of a partnership announcement
Stephen.full-pick-text: The Google Gemini logo is shown on screen as part of a partnership announcement

Stephen.text: The new version of macOS drops support for some Intel Macs
Stephen.full-pick-text: The new version of macOS drops support for some Intel Macs

Myke.text: A Google LLM is powering Siri's features by default
Myke.full-pick-text: A Google LLM is powering Siri's features by default
Myke.notes: • This might not be verifiable if Apple keeps the details close, but Myke is confident that if it's true, we'll know.

Myke.text: By the end of the year, Apple will not have shipped equivalent features for the Apple Intelligence features shown at WWDC 2024
Myke.full-pick-text: By the end of the year, Apple will not have shipped equivalent features for the Apple Intelligence features shown at WWDC 2024. Craig Federighi will talk at least once more about there being '2 architectures.' Apple will once again promise that the missing features will be shipping by the end of the next year. Actions across apps is one of the features that will not ship.
Myke.notes:
• "Craig Federighi will talk at least once more about there being '2 architectures.'"
  • "Apple will once again promise that the missing features will be shipping by the end of the next year."
  • "Actions across apps is one of the features that will not ship."

Myke.text: Apple has a new app for gamers
Myke.full-pick-text: Apple has a new app for gamers. It's called Apple Games. It creates new, specific developer terms for games. It features a partnership with Microsoft for Xbox Game Pass.
Myke.notes:
• "It's called Apple Games."
  • "It creates new, specific developer terms for games."
  • "It features a partnership with Microsoft for Xbox Game Pass."

Myke.full-pick-text: New features are announced that are powered by Apple Intelligence

Myke.text: Significantly new OS design on at least one platform
Myke.full-pick-text: Significantly new OS design on at least one platform

Federico.text: Apple ships a foldable phone that:
Federico.full-pick-text: Apple ships a foldable phone that: Is called 'iPhone Duo.' Runs both iOS and iPadOS apps and seamlessly switches between them. Has a feature that operates both the outer and inner screens at the same time.
Federico.notes:
• "Is called 'iPhone Duo.'"
  • "Runs both iOS and iPadOS apps and seamlessly switches between them."
  • "Has a feature that operates both the outer and inner screens at the same time."

Federico.text: Apple ships some of the AI features previously seen in 2024
Federico.full-pick-text: Apple ships some of the AI features previously seen in 2024

Federico.text: Apple updates the MacBook Air with the M5
Federico.full-pick-text: Apple updates the MacBook Air with the M5

Federico.text: MacBook Pro is refreshed with a new chip
Federico.full-pick-text: MacBook Pro is refreshed with a new chip
Federico.notes: • There is some question as to whether a pick from 3 games ago includes the 2025 game that was graded moments ago, and it is decided that it does. Now that ahead of their time picks grant bonus picks, this throwback from 2023 can now be used.

Federico.text: Apple opens up AFM (Apple Foundation Model) to developers
Federico.full-pick-text: Apple opens up AFM (Apple Foundation Model) to developers. It's a 3B parameter version only that runs on device. It's designed in a way that only specific "endpoints" can be used with a native API, like summarization or writing or prioritizing content. Apple shows off examples of how they're using the same tech in its own system apps.
Federico.notes:
• "It's a 3B parameter version only that runs on device."
  • "It's designed in a way that only specific "endpoints" can be used with a native API, like summarization or writing or prioritizing content." (In other words, developers won't be able to prompt the API with arbitrary text, they only have access to particular tasks like summarization.)
  • "Apple shows off examples of how they're using the same tech in its own system apps."

Federico.text: Apple rebrands version numbers of its operating systems
Federico.full-pick-text: Apple rebrands version numbers of its operating systems
